topic.title: ZeroNet uses Block Chain, like Bitcoin? So We ALL need to download the WHOLE net?
topic.body:
Hi, I am so curious if I understand correctly, as a ZeroNet client, I need to download the whole ZeroNet related content to serve others just like other block chain stuffs, right? 
This means, all of us are trying to download the whole internet if ZeroNet is trying to be an another decentralized internet. Sounds  a bit kinky. :p
